title: Use VAR to Review a Disputed Goal
description: A goal is scored in a soccer match, but the referee suspects an offside violation. The Video Assistant Referee (VAR) must review the play.

tasks.description: Retrieve all camera angles of the play leading up to the goal.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent accesses and syncs feeds from all broadcast cameras.

tasks.description: Use virtual line technology to determine the player's position at the exact moment the ball was passed.
tasks.expected_outcome: The technology shows the attacking player was in an offside position.

tasks.description: Communicate the finding to the on-field referee, recommending they disallow the goal.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent sends a clear and concise recommendation to the referee.
